sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Updates subnet in the specified VCN.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -OCID of the compartment of the subnet.
  • Subnet ID -Subnet's Oracle ID (OCID).
  • Display Name -User-friendly name.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • DHCP Options ID -OCID of the set of DHCP options that the subnet uses.
  • Security List IDs -OCIDs of the security list or lists that the subnet uses.
  • Route Table ID -OCID of the route table that the subnet uses.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Lifecycle State -VCN's current state.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.
  • CIDR Block -CIDR IP address range of the subnet.
  • Network ID -OCID of the VCN the subnet is in.
  • Prohibit Public IP on VNIC -Option to specify if the VNICs within this subnet can have public IP addresses.
  • Time Created -Date and time the subnet was created.
  • Virtual Router IP -IP address of the virtual router.
  • Virtual Router Mac -MAC address of the virtual router.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Updates subnet in the specified VCN.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -OCID of the compartment of the subnet.
  • Subnet ID -Subnet's Oracle ID (OCID).
  • Display Name -User-friendly name.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • DHCP Options ID -OCID of the set of DHCP options that the subnet uses.
  • Security List IDs -OCIDs of the security list or lists that the subnet uses.
  • Route Table ID -OCID of the route table that the subnet uses.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Lifecycle State -VCN's current state.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.
  • CIDR Block -CIDR IP address range of the subnet.
  • Network ID -OCID of the VCN the subnet is in.
  • Prohibit Public IP on VNIC -Option to specify if the VNICs within this subnet can have public IP addresses.
  • Time Created -Date and time the subnet was created.
  • Virtual Router IP -IP address of the virtual router.
  • Virtual Router Mac -MAC address of the virtual router.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
